title: Deep Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: Design Tacit Knowledge Acquisition Strategies via Digital Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Design Process Knowledge and Understanding of User Experience (UX) Concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Develop the ability to analyze user nonverbal behavior patterns using VR simulations and translate findings into design insights.

Learners analyze ≥3 user experience (UX) scenarios using digital prototyping tools like Figma or Adobe XD, create 2 prototypes visualizing tacit experiences, and achieve ≥4 points (5-point scale) in creativity scores from peer reviews and instructor feedback.

Learners collect and incorporate ≥3 rounds of user feedback in a 4-week team-based AI studio project, document team communication history using collaboration tools (Slack, Notion, etc.), and achieve "excellent" ratings in ≥4 out of 5 peer evaluation rubric items upon project completion.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
